participant_1.background:
Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
my friends and i go hiking all the time.
my husband is the ceo of taco bell.
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.

participant_2.background:
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
i work as an interior designer.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.
my favorite pass time is gazing at clouds.

content.text: Great, thanks! Just got back from a hike with my friends.
That sounds fun! I love hiking.
Me too! We hiked to a lake and swam, roasted marshmallows, and had a campfire. It was so nice!
That sounds like a great time! I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! I'm really into music and video editing. Do you have any hobbies?
I love music too! I spend a lot of time listening to it and trying to produce music myself. I also like interior design and spend a lot of time working on my home.
That's awesome! I used to do some interior design, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
I understand. It can be a lot of work, but it's so rewarding!
I agree! I love seeing the finished product and knowing that I had a hand in creating it.
What's your favorite thing about interior design?
I love being able to create a space that's both beautiful and functional. I also love the challenge of working with different styles and creating something unique.
That's amazing! I can see why you enjoy it so much.
